Magic
Spell Slots: A0: 6; A1: 4; A2: 4; A3: 4; A4: 4; A5: 4; A6: 4 Focus Points: 2 Attack: Arcane: +19 (intelligence; expert) Spell DC: Arcane: 29 (intelligence; expert)
Spells:
Acid Arrow (A2 Evo): R120' Spell attack inflicts 3d8 HP acid (critical hit doubles) plus 1d6 HP persistent acid (heightened +2 inflicts +2d8 initial and +1d6 HP persistent)
Acid Splash (A0 Evo): R30' Spell attack inflicts 1d6 HP acid (critical hit also 1 HP persistent acid) and 1 HP acid splash (heightened 3rd inflicts 1d6+3 HP initial and 2 HP persistent; 5th inflicts 2d6+3 HP initial, 3 HP persistent, and 2 HP splash; 7th inflicts 3d6+3 HP initial, 4 HP persistent, and 3 HP splash; 9th inflicts 4d6+3 HP initial, 5 HP persistent, and 4 HP splash)

Air Bubble (A1 Con): R60' Allows target to breathe normally for 1 min
Alarm (A1 Abj): 20' burst triggers choice of mental or audible alarm when a Small or larger corporeal creature enters without saying the specified password for 8 hr
Ant Haul (A1 Tra): Touched can carry +3 Bulk without encumbrance and +6 Bulk maximum for 8 hr

Augment Summoning (A1 Con): R30' Target summoned creature gains +1 to all checks for 1 min

Magic Notes:
Abjuration: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Protective Ward spell
Advanced School Spell: Knows the Energy Absorption spell/+1 Focus Points
Arcane School: Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Arcane)
Abjuration: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Abjuration spell
Arcane Sense: May cast Detect Magic at level 1 at will
Arcane Spellcasting: May learn spells from the arcane tradition
Cantrip Expansion: May prepare two additional cantrips each day
Drain Bonded Item: (R) May cast an expended spell using power stored in a possession 1/day
Magic Sense: Has continuous 1st-level Detect Magic effects that increase to 3rd-level during Seek
Spell Substitution: May use a 10-minute process to replace 1 prepared spell with a different spell
Steady Spellcasting: A successful DC 15 flat check negates self spellcasting disruption
Widen Spell: (1) May increase the effect of a 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', and the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
